Package com

Class EZLangClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.EZLangClient
  • public class EZLangClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Client class for assembling interpreter components, receiving filepath to a .ez file and taking text of the file and passing it to be interpreted
    Author:
    Berlian K

      This method checks if filepath is a valid filepath to a .ez file
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method for running interpreter program
      static void runEZFile​(java.lang.String path)
      This method takes a filepath of a .ez file and calls checkFile() to check validity of file path and if valid passes it to be run by the interpreter
      static void runSourceCode​(java.lang.String sourceCode)
      This method runs the sourcecode of a .ez file with the interpreter.
